description:
Te huur ruime garagebox vlakbij de Zuid-as en Gelderlandplein (beide op 3 minuten wandel-afstand).

Garagebox is recent fris geschilderd.

Ook geschikt voor opslag of het parkeren van een SUV of bestelauto .
Huurprijs v.a. 225 p/m, inclusief service-kosten. Zakelijk huren/uitreiking BTW-factuur mogelijk.

Beautiful renovated unfurnished apartment of 150m2 with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a modern kitchen with balcony, a laundry room and a spacious living room. The apartment on the third floor is located in a beautiful and quiet neighbourhood the “Rivierenbuurt”.
Layout:
Through the common entrance, you will enter the apartment on the third floor. The hallway gives access to all the rooms. At the front, you have the living room with a beautiful wooden floor and equipped with many windows. This ensures a lot of light in the room. The separate modern living kitchen with a balcony, facing West, is provided with a large fridge, freezer, dishwasher and an oven. Next to the kitchen you have a laundry room/pantry with a washing machine. There is also a separate toilet.
With the wooden staircase you enter the first floor with two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom has a built-in wardrobe and ensuite a modern bathroom with a toilet, a sink and a walk-in shower. At the front the second bedroom or home office. The bathroom in the hallway is also provided with a walk-in shower, toilet and a sink.
The second floor can be used as a spacious double bedroom or chill area.
Details:
-	Rental price: €3.500,- excluding utilities and local taxes
-	Deposit 2 months rent
-	Unfurnished
-	150 M2
-	3 bedrooms
-	Mandatory cleaning twice a month, excluding the rental price
-	Recently renovated
-	Spacious apartment
Location:
This apartment is located in the lovely neighbourhood the “Rivierenbuurt”. It’s quiet and nice living area with lots of green. Near by you have the Maasstraat, Rijnstraat and the Scheldestraat, ideal for shops, restaurants, schools and sports facilities. Also the lovely Pijp area is within walking distance. The public transport is within walking distance, also the city center, RAI conference center and the Beatrixpark. Also the direct roads are just around the corner, with connections to the A10 and A2 ring roads. From there you can be on the A1 or A4 within five minutes.

features: aan rustige weg, beschutte ligging, in woonwijk cv ketel, vloerverwarming geheel
description:
Modern, luxuriously and unfurnished apartment with one bedroom on the third floor of "the Nieuwpoort" which is an apartment complex that was completely renovated in 2017. The apartment has a luxury living room with an open kitchen and is located in a side street of the Haarlemmerweg, around the corner from the Bos and Lommerweg with its nice stores and cozy cafes.

Layout:
Via the common entrance you can take the stairs or elevator to the third floor.

The living and dining room have high ceilings and it is very bright because of the large window in the front. It has an open fully equipped kitchen, with various appliances like an oven, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher and gas stove. In the hall you will find the separate toilet and the storage room with space for the washing machine.

At the rear there is the spacious and bright bedroom. The closet in the bedroom will stay.  From the bedroom you have access to the luxury bathroom with a walk-in rain shower and a sink.

The entire apartment has a beautiful heated casting floor.

At the front of the apartment there is a small terrace. There is a communal courtyard garden (designed by Piet Boon's studio) that includes sports equipment.

Details:
-	Rental price: €1550,- excl. utilities, internet & TV and local taxes
-	Available immediately
-	2 months deposit
-	Unfurnished
-	49m2
-	1 bedroom
-	Maximum 24 months,  model B

Location:
The house is located on the edge of the Bos en Lommer district and the Staatsliedenbuurt, two pleasant neighborhoods, each with their own charm. The Bos en Lommer district in Amsterdam West is become extremely popular. There is always something to do and see in this area. On the Bos en Lommerweg there are many nice shops and restaurants. In the Westerpark you can fully enjoy nature while exercising, walking or relaxing. The apartment is easily accessible. It is located just behind the Haarlemmerweg (S103), so you are quickly on the A10 and other roads. Schiphol is a fifteen minute drive. Sloterdijk is about 5 minutes by bike, Central Station 10 minutes.

features: aan water, in centrum, in woonwijk cv ketel frans balkon
description:
Beautiful characteristic UNFURNISHED apartment of 85m2 with high ceilings, a large kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom, 2 balconies and an amazing view over the canal. This apartment is located on the first floor!

Layout:
Through the common entrance you enter this charming apartment on the first floor. The spacious living room with a high ceiling is located at the front of the house. The apartment is very light, has 2 windows with wide views and a French balcony. The living room has an open kitchen which can be fully equipped with various appliances. The whole apartment has a beautiful wooden herringbone floor, a fireplace and the authentic details give lots of character.

The bedroom is located at the rear, very quiet, and gives access to a spacious balcony. The bathroom has a shower, a sink and a toilet. Located next to the bedroom, a large storage room is equipped as a laundry room with both a washing machine and dryer.

Details:
- Rental price € 2.200,- excluding utilities
- Deposit 2 months' rent
- Unfurnished
- Available since 1st of December 2021
- Separate storage / laundry room
- Smoking and pets are not allowed

Location
The apartment is situated in a quiet part but the lively and popular Utrechtsestraat with a large variety of charming shops, cafes and restaurants are around the corner and also "The Hermitage" and "Theater Carré".
Public transport towards Amsterdam Central Station and Amsterdam South WTC within walking distance.

features: in centrum, in woonwijk, open ligging, vrij uitzicht
description:
Bright and fully furnished penthouse-apartment of 145m2 with a spacious living room with a lot of windows, a modern kitchen with cook island, three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a private roof terrace of 70m2 with a unique view overlooking the city center. Possible to rent an indoor private parking underneath the building.

Layout:
With the elevator you go to the 9th top floor.

Entrance, hall with access to a guest room or study room, storage and a separate toilet.

Stairs to the 1st floor give access to the kitchen with living area, bathroom, laundry room and the master bedroom.
The modern kitchen with a cook island is provided with a large fridge, a freezer, a dishwasher and an oven.
The spacious and bright living room has many windows that gives the room a lot of daylight and an amazing view over Amsterdam.
At the rear is the master bedroom with large wardrobes.
The bathroom is provided with a walk-in shower, a bathtub, a sink and a toilet.

On the 2nd floor, the third bedroom/study room with a private bathroom with a shower and a sink. Through the sliding door you can enter the sun-drenched roof terrace of 70m2 with an incredible view overlooking Amsterdam.

Details:
- Rental price: € 3.690 excluding utilities, internet/tv, local taxes and parking place
- Excluding € 210 ,- for G/W/E
- Deposit 2 months
- Fully furnished
- Three bedrooms
- Two bathrooms
- Private roof terrace of 70m2
- Elevator
- An amazing view overlooking Amsterdam
- Private indoor parking place for rent for €220,- per month

Location:
The apartment is located in a large complex. The central train station and the Haarlemmerstraat with a variety of shops, bars and restaurants are within walking distance.  Also the supermarkets like the Albert Heijn and the Marqt. The public transport in this area is very good and around the corner.

features: aan rustige weg, in centrum, in woonwijk cv ketel
description:
A nice renovated and fully furnished apartment of 77m2 with an open kitchen, a spacious dining area with sofa, two sliding doors to the TV room, a bathroom with en suite the bathroom and two balconies. The apartment is located on the first floor in the Musuem Quarter of Amsterdam Old-South.

Layout:
You reach the apartment through the communal entrance on the ground floor with stairs to the first floor.
Entrance, the hall with a separate toilet and a storage room with the central heating system. At the front the open kitchen who is fully equipped with all appliances like a Smeg oven with a 4-burner cooker, fridge, freezer, microwave, extractor and dishwasher. From the spacious living area with high ceilings you can reach the sunny south-facing balcony where you can enjoy the sun. Through the en suite sliding doors you reach the TV room with built-in closets and the second balcony.
At the rear is the bedroom with a classic sink and a cabinet including the washer/dryer. You can access the tiled bathroom who is provided with a walk-in shower.
The whole apartment has a herringbone floor that gives a warm feeling and a chic look.

Details:
Rental price: €2.250 excluding utilities and local taxes
2 months deposit
Fully furnished
77m2
Renovated apartment
One-bedroom
Two balconies
High ceilings
Maximum 24 months contract (Model B)

Location:
The apartment is located in a green and child-friendly street. There are many shops, restaurants and nice cafes in this neighborhood. Within walking distance you are at the Museumplein with the supermarket and the Concertgebouw, P.C. Hooftstraat and Cornelis Schuytstraat. Also Vondelpark is immediately vicinity. The public transport in this area is very good, you can take different tramlines. There is also a good connection to the Ring A1- by car.

features: aan rustige weg, in centrum cv ketel lift
description:
Available immediately.
Bright furnished apartment available with a canal view in the center of Amsterdam. Close to Dam square and the popular Jordaan area.
Layout:
Through the common staircase with elevator you can easily enter the apartment that is located on the second floor. Living room with open kitchen, plenty windows and two doors opening to a fabulous view at the canal. The apartment has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has a an-suite bathroom with a bath, shower, double sink and toilet. Next to the guest bedroom you will find a bathroom with a shower, toilet and washer/dryer.
- Available immediately
- Rent € 2.750.- euro excl.
- Deposit € 5.500.- euro
- Elevator
- Wooden floor
- 2 Bedrooms
- 2 Bathrooms
- 120 m2
- Great location
- Furnished
- Smoking and pets are not allowed
The location is in the prestigious historic Grachtengordel West / Negen Straatjes (nine streets) area. Here, you have an easy access to trendy shops, restaurants, cafés, cinemas and late opened supermarkets and takeaways. Despite of its central locations, the place is remarkably quiet, as there are barely any cars on the streets here.

features: in centrum, in woonwijk blokverwarming tv kabel
description:
In the most popular and trendy area location ''The Pijp'' you will find this beautiful one-bedroom apartment. The house is located in a quiet street of the Pijp. Once you walk a bit further, you will stand at the lively Ferdinand Bolstraat, Marie Heinekenplein and the famous Albert Cuyp market. There are many shops, cozy restaurants and cafes.

Layout:
You enter the apartment through a common staircase. In the hall there is enough space for your coats and shoes.The living room is bright and has an open kitchen and a large balcony. The apartment has 1 bedroom with fitted wardrobes, bathroom with sink and a shower and a washing machine and dryer. Furthermore, there is a separate toilet. The apartment is modern and perfect for a single person.

Details:
- Available January 1st 2022
- Rental price € 1.550,- excl. utilities, internet/TV, local taxes
- Rental period minimum 1 year
- Central heating costs of €35,- per month
- Fully furnished
- Two months deposit
- Smoking is not allowed
- Mandatory cleaning 2 times a month, excluding the rental price

Location:
The apartment is located in the district of South in the popular neighborhood known as the Pijp. Nearby are many stores, supermarkets, restaurants and cafes, not to forget the Albert Cuyp market. Within walking distance you will find both the Sarphatipark and the Vondelpark. Public transport is very good and easily accessible, the house is near the Ferdinand Bolstraat, the Weteringcircuit and of course the North-South line.  There is a very good accessibility by public transport, the Ferdinand Bolstraat, the Weteringcircuit and of course the North South Line.

features: aan drukke weg, in centrum cv ketel mechanische ventilatie, tv kabel
description:
Bright and unfurnished upper house of 100m2 with a wide terrace which is located on a nice and cozy street surrounded by a wide range of stores and restaurants. The apartment has two spacious bedrooms, a modern bathroom, a luxurious kitchen and living room. The apartment is located in the heart of Amsterdam, city center near The Jordaan, Noordermarkt and Central Station.

Layout:
You enter the apartment on the second floor through a common staircase. Here is a coat rack where you can hang your coats. Through the internal staircase you arrive on the third floor which gives you access to the two bedrooms and bathroom. The large bedroom at the rear has three large windows and built-in wardrobes. The second bedroom also has a built-in closet and is located at the front of the property. This room could also be used as a guest room or study. The modern bathroom has a bathtub, walk-in shower, toilet and a sink with mirror. On the landing there is a separate room for the washing machine and dryer.

The staircase takes you to the fourth and also the top floor with many windows all around and a sliding door to the terrace at the rear. The open and very luxurious kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer, induction stove and an oven.

The landlord leaves some furniture in the apartment. In the living room these are the custom made wooden table, green sofa with small chair, TV/bookcase and the television. On the outside terrace the two chairs and flower box will remain.

The entire apartment has a wooden floor and double glazing.

Details:
- Rental price: €2.500,- excl. utilities and local taxes
- 2 months deposit
- 100m2
- Partly furnished: dining room table, green couch with chair, TV/bookcase, television, terrace chairs and flower box
- 2 bedrooms
- Balcony facing South
- Separate storage
- Maximum 24 months, model B
- Mandatory cleaning 2 times a month, excluding the rental price

Location:
The apartment is located at the buzzing Haarlemmerdijk with plenty shops, coffee shops around the corner. There are also several caterers, hair salons and various supermarkets. It’s a famous neighbourhood and also near by the Jordaan and the Noordermarkt. The Amsterdam Central Train Station is about a few minutes by bike and within walking distance you are at the Haarlemmerplein. The public transport in this area is very good, there are different tram and bus lines. The high way is easily accessible.
